item.description:
Come join the group for our annual gathering to eat, drink, be merry, to DANCE and to attend to some business (we'll keep this part short, sweet and fun ).


Date: Saturday, November 10
Time: 6:30 PM - 12:30 AM
Location: Knights of Columbus Hall, 17 Willow St, Westborough


Bill Mullen will be back with his band, Rufus Leekin', to regale us with his saxophone playing. Work off dinner with a night of dancing and have some great fun!

FMI: http://amcworcester.org/WorcesterChapterMeeting.html

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: AMC Worcester - Annual Dinner, Dance, and (short) meeting
